oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-07-07 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 7, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer), guest performer Johnny Cash (his first appearance as an Opry member), and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carl Smith; Rod Brasfield; Johnny Cash
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Carl Smith -- You Are The One (Carl Smith) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Johnny Cash -- Folsom Prison Blues (Johnny Cash) -- Carl Smith talks -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] -- Carl Smith talks -- My Dream Of The Old Rugged Cross (Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Carl Smith) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Carl Smith introduces Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Cash, Johnny; Smith, Carl, 1927-2010
